snippet.title: FTL: Multiverse Trailer [4.0]
snippet.description:
Download Multiverse on the subset forums here: https://subsetgames.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=35332

FTL: Multiverse is a massive overhaul mod for the roguelike game FTL: Faster Than Light. Taking place after the events of the vanilla game, you play as a brave hero in a galaxy where interdimensional travel is now possible and has launched the collective realities of the multiverse into chaos!
Multiverse has an extensive new lore building off of vanilla's, with dozens of new factions and large expansions to existing ones. But what makes Multiverse really unique is Hyperspace, a new modding API that allows us to add new crew, infinite player ships, and so much more!
With infinite realities, there's also infinite possibilities.

And join our discord too! Our community is growing rapidly, and we'll be more than happy to handle any questions, suggestions, or troubles you might have.
https://discord.gg/hhs5ecx

Trailer was put together by PDTM, a member of our dev team.
